Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #21 buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop bound Purple line Express Line Service Delayed at Thorndale
ShortDescription: Loop bound Purple line Express trains are standing at Thorndale due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop bound Purple line Express trains are standing at Thorndale due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
